articles.title: Philippines connection suspected in spree of Japan home invasions - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Tokyo police seek extradition of four suspects, including possible ringleader
articles.content: TOKYO -- Japanese police have asked the Philippines to extradite four men suspected of involvement in a three-month-long string of robberies across Japan, including a possible ringleader who gave ord… [+260 chars]

articles.title: Species richness of bat flies and their associations with host bats in a subtropical East Asian region - Parasites & Vectors - Parasites & Vectors
articles.description: Background Understanding the interactions between bat flies and host bats offer us fundamental insights into the coevolutionary and ecological processes in host-parasite relationships. Here, we investigated the identities, host specificity, and patterns of ho…

articles.title: Adani Group: Fortune of Asia's richest man hit by fraud claims - BBC
articles.description: A report of fraud has sparked a mass sell-off in businesses led by Indian billionaire Gautam Adani.
articles.content: Indian billionaire Gautam Adani saw more than $20bn (£16bn) wiped off his fortune on Friday, after investors fled his companies for a second day prompted by fraud claims made by a US investment firm.… [+1969 chars]

articles.title: Here's a tour of an original 60s kampung house in the west - AsiaOne
articles.description: Kampung homes in Singapore are few and far between. And in an era of HDB BTOs, MOPs (or whatever other acronym related to housing these days), it’s refreshing to come across a family that still lives in a kampung house. In fact, the house, located on Jubilee …
articles.content:
